body.p: In November the Hamburg FSFE Fellows meet at the Roxie, Rentzelstra√üe 6. We will welcome Matthias Kirschner as a special guest to that Meeting, he will talk about current and planned FSFE activities.
As usual, you will find more detailed information on the wiki page.
For regular meetings, we recommend you to have a look at the wiki page and maybe also to subscribe to the mailing list.
